name: Garden Fruit Modoka
description:
Garden Fruit Modoka is a fruit slicing style match-3 free casual game!
Fast matching to make fruits blast, challenge over 100 addictive juicy puzzles! Collect more stars as best as you can! Start your own juicy splash journey.
Features:
- Free last bonus
- Stunning fruits slice effects
- Over 100 different and interesting levels
- Time mode and moves mode
- Powerful boosters make game more fun!
